12 games played over 2 days.  Assuming an average of 2 drakes slain per game which is on the lower end and that the chance of a fire dragon appearing is 0.25
n=24 and p=0.25.  P(at least 1)=1-P(0)
1-(0.75^12)=0.9683(4sf)
Chance of a fire dragon not appearing is therefore more than 96.8% since usually at least 2 dragons are slain per game
